body:
Excuse me, but so I’d really like to read all Katashibu series, including this one, in both English (Canada) and Chinese Traditional (Taiwan) Versions asap, please.

Anyways, thank you so much! Amen!
Excuse me but so I’d really like to read this Hentai Manga both within Full Colour and Full English/Chinese Traditional (Taiwan)/Japanese/Korean/French Versions asap, please.
